rules_text: [i](Can be artifact, land, or multicolored as needed.)[/i]
special_text:
Mechanical Spark 3 [i](During your turn, this planeswalker is also a 3/3 creature and damage doesn't cause it to lose loyalty.)[/i]
[+1]: Up to one target creature gains your choice of trample or lifelink until end of turn.
[-3]: Exile target creature without Mechanical Spark. Create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 1/1 black Reflection.
